hero.title: Scholarsuite
hero.tagline: Your school management app, all free and open source

getInvolved.title: Ready to get involved?
getInvolved.description: There are many ways you can help us build the app.

contribute.title: Contribute to the project
contribute.description: Help us build the app by contributing to the codebase on GitHub.

testApp.title: Test the app
testApp.description: Help us test the app by using it in your school and providing feedback.

reportBugs.title: Report a bugs
reportBugs.description: Help us improve the app by reporting bugs you find.

featureRequests.title: Request features
featureRequests.description: Help us improve the app by requesting features you need.

explainInterest.title: Explain your interest in the app
explainInterest.description: Help us understand how you plan to use the app. What size of school, what part of the app are you interested in ...

supportProject.title: Support the project
supportProject.description: Help us keep the project alive by supporting us. Just by starring the project on GitHub, you are already helping.
